recipes.name: Classic Cheese Omelet
recipes.description: A fluffy omelet filled with melted cheese

recipes.name: Tomato Cheese Toast
recipes.description: Crispy toast topped with fresh tomatoes and melted cheese

recipes.name: Scrambled Eggs with Tomato
recipes.description: Creamy scrambled eggs with fresh diced tomatoes

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with olive oil

recipes.name: Cheese Quesadilla
recipes.description: Crispy tortilla filled with melted cheese

recipes.name: Tomato Basil Pasta
recipes.description: Simple pasta with fresh tomatoes and basil

steps.instruction: Crack 3-4 eggs into a bowl and whisk them well with a pinch of salt and pepper.
steps.tips: Whisking incorporates air for a fluffier omelet

steps.instruction: Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium-low heat until it starts to foam.
steps.tips: Medium-low heat prevents the eggs from cooking too quickly

steps.instruction: Pour the whisked eggs into the pan and let them sit for 30 seconds without stirring.
steps.tips: This creates a good base for the omelet

steps.instruction: Using a spatula, gently push the cooked edges toward the center, tilting the pan to let uncooked egg flow underneath.
steps.tips: Work quickly but gently to maintain the omelet's structure

steps.instruction: When the eggs are almost set but still slightly wet on top, add grated cheese to one half of the omelet.
steps.tips: The residual heat will melt the cheese perfectly

steps.instruction: Fold the omelet in half using the spatula and slide onto a plate. Serve immediately.
steps.tips: Serve hot for the best texture and flavor

steps.instruction: Toast the bread slices until golden brown and crispy.
steps.tips: Use medium heat to avoid burning

steps.instruction: Slice the tomato into 1/4 inch thick rounds and season with salt.
Brush the toast with olive oil and arrange tomato slices on top.
steps.tips: Olive oil adds flavor and helps toppings adhere

steps.instruction: Top with cheese and place under broiler for 2-3 minutes until cheese melts.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve immediately.
steps.tips: Fresh basil adds the perfect finishing touch
